issue.title: [C++] Implement "random access" reads for GCS FileSystem
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14347](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14347). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Implement the `GcsFileSystem::OpenInputFile()` overloads and tests for them.
